ClientId.description: The ID of the client associated with the user pool.

Password.description: The password of the user you wish to register.

SecretHash.description: A keyed-hash message authentication code (HMAC) calculated using the secret key of a user pool client and username plus the client ID in the message.

UserAttributes.description: An array of name-value pairs representing user attributes.

Username.description: The user name of the user you wish to register.

ValidationData.description: The validation data in the request to register a user.
